content:
Complex 1 was obtained by mixing H3PMTA (0.5 mmol), Co(NO3)2·6H2O (0.5 mmol), Zn(NO3)2·6H2O (0.5 mmol), and 4,4′-bipyridine (0.5 mmol) in 15 mL of distilled water. The pH was adjusted to about 4 via the addition of 1 M NaOH solution, and the mixture was transferred to a Teflon-lined autoclave (23 mL) and heated at 120 °C for 3 days. After slow cooling to room temperature, purple plate–shaped crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were isolated from the resulting solution. Elemental anal. Found for 1: C, 15.9; H, 3.7; N, 3.5; S, 8.9. Calcd: C, 16.1; H, 3.5; N, 3.8; S, 8.6. IR, (KBr,cm−1) υ: 3399.43 (s), 1620.59 (s), 1441.10 (w), 1407.92 (m), 1321.06 (w), 1258.13 (w), 1201.33 (w), 1122.75 (s), 1070.91 (s), 986.58(s), 944.13(w), 741.46(m), 561.51(m).

Preparation of {[Zn<sub>6</sub>Zn(PMTA)<sub>6</sub>][Zn(H<sub>2</sub>O)<sub>4</sub>]<sub>2</sub>·8H<sub>2</sub>O}<sub>n</sub> (<bold>2)</bold>

Complex 2 was synthesized by a similar method to that used for complex 1. Colorless plate–shaped crystals of 2 were collected when the metal salt was only Zn(NO3)2·6H2O. Elemental anal. found for 2: C, 15.9; H, 3.6; N, 3.5; S, 8.9. Calc: C, 16.2; H, 3.4; N, 3.8; S, 8.7. IR, (KBr,cm−1) υ: 3412.67 (s), 1620.26 (s), 1441.15 (w), 1407.16 (m), 1320.52 (w), 1251.88 (w), 1224.77 (w), 1123.60 (s), 1072.48 (s), 986.79 (s), 944.64 (w), 741.29(m), 561.11(m).
clean_text:
Preparation of {[Zn6Co(PMTA)6][Co(H2O)4]2⋅10H2O}n (1)

Complex 1 was obtained by mixing H3PMTA (0.5 mmol), Co(NO3)2⋅6H2O (0.5 mmol), Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (0.5 mmol), and 4,4'-bipyridine (0.5 mmol) in 15 mL of distilled water. The pH was adjusted to about 4 via the addition of  1 M NaOH solution, and the mixture was transferred to a Teflon-lined autoclave (23 mL) and heated at 120 °C for 3 days. After slow cooling to room temperature, purple plate-shaped crystals suitable for X-ray diffraction were isolated from the resulting solution. Elemental anal. Found for 1: C, 15.9; H, 3.7; N, 3.5; S, 8.9. Calcd: C, 16.1; H, 3.5; N, 3.8; S, 8.6. IR, (KBr,cm-1) υ: 3399.43 (s), 1620.59 (s), 1441.10 (w), 1407.92 (m), 1321.06 (w), 1258.13 (w), 1201.33 (w), 1122.75 (s), 1070.91 (s), 986.58(s), 944.13(w), 741.46(m), 561.51(m).

Preparation of {[Zn6Zn(PMTA)6][Zn(H2O)4]2⋅8H2O}n (2)

Complex 2 was synthesized by a similar method to that used for complex 1. Colorless plate-shaped crystals of 2 were collected when the metal salt was only Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O. Elemental anal. found for 2: C, 15.9; H, 3.6; N, 3.5; S, 8.9. Calc: C, 16.2; H, 3.4; N, 3.8; S, 8.7. IR, (KBr,cm-1) υ: 3412.67 (s), 1620.26 (s), 1441.15 (w), 1407.16 (m), 1320.52 (w), 1251.88 (w), 1224.77 (w), 1123.60 (s), 1072.48 (s), 986.79 (s), 944.64 (w), 741.29(m), 561.11(m).
